Our Electrical Services

Professional, reliable electrical services across Somerset. From emergency repairs to complete rewires, we're here to help.

EICR Testing

Electrical Installation Condition Reports for landlords and homeowners. Required every 5 years for rental properties.

  • • Comprehensive safety inspections
  • • Full certification provided
  • • Landlord compliance
  • • Same-day reports available
Learn More

  • • RCBOs & SPD installation
  • • Tidy, professional work
  • • Full certification
Learn More

Quick diagnosis and safe repairs for electrical faults and circuit problems.

Rewires

  • • Modern cable installation

Learn More
